title: This tool confuses Google's ad network to protect your privacy | MIT Techno
excerpt: Current privacy laws don’t shield people from the pervasive surveillance of Big Tech. Guerrilla tactics are all we’ve got.

title: How to poison the data that Big Tech uses to surveil you
excerpt: Algorithms are meaningless without good data. The public can exploit that to demand change.

title: Ghost sites, domain spoofing, fake apps: A guide to knowing your ad fraud
excerpt: Digital ad fraud is a volume game. Here’s a primer on how to spot the core techniques used to generate CPM fraud.
